bottles.message: Everything is going to be okay
Just wanted to let you know that for a few weeks now I have been healing, and I sincerely hope you will get to heal too, or anything else that you may need. Life can be great too.
Hello villager- life is hard but you are brave! Weâ€™ll get through this together!
Can you find something to be grateful today? Whether it's upcoming or it already happened, anything nice no matter how small. This evening the spaghetti I made turned out really tasty!
